snippet: HOFFMAN--Edna. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Edna Hoffman, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Edna's beloved children, Elisabeth Doft (Alan), Constance de Balmann (Yves), Laurence, and Bruce; her grandchildren; her great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: HOFFMAN--Edna. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Edna Hoffman, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Edna's beloved children, Elisabeth Doft (Alan), Constance de Balmann (Yves), Laurence, and Bruce; her grandchildren; her great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
